name: Dinosaurs vs. The Ice Age
description:
The goal of this game is to reach the flag pole on each stage. You have a blaster gun for melting faces... but in a pinch it can melt ice blocks as well. Just watch out so you don't drown in the water!

Controls:

  • A: Move Left
  • D: Move Right
  • Space: Jump
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left Click: Shoot (hold for rapid fire)

Entry for https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-winter-2020
